:Great! Since you enjoy action and war movies, especially those featuring Bruce Willis, here are some recommendations for you:

1. Die Hard (1988)
2. Lone Survivor (2013)
3. 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi (2016)
4. Tears of the Sun (2003)
5. A Good Day to Die Hard (2013)
6. The Expendables (2010)
7. G.I. Joe: Retaliation (2013)
8. The Siege (1998)
9. Red (2010)
10. The Last Boy Scout (1991)

I appreciate the suggestions, but I think you should know about a film that features a retired black-ops CIA agent who reunites with his old team to take down a high-tech assassin. It has a great mix of action and humor, and the cast includes some fantastic actors. It's definitely worth checking out!
